commitResults.messageBody:
* 'master' of https://github.com/BenjoBurger/tp:
  Update text ui test
  Fix import statement for checkstyle test
  Add some assertions and some basic logging
  Add an test for source function
  Change to article numbers starting at 1 and method access updates
  Add basic functionality for a news bot to return the source of the news, start, and quit.
  Replace dash with semicolon as delimiter in sample news text file
  Create a news article class to store related info together
  Change logo to NewsOnTheGo and update text-ui-test to check for logo using LF line endings
  Update app name in all places to NewsOnTheGo, except documentation
  Remove unused import so that gradle can build without errors
  Add a fake news text file for testing use

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JUnit test case for daily function and move function into a package
Merge branch 'feature-daily-function' of https://github.com/BenjoBurger/tp into feature-daily-function
commitResults.messageBody:
* 'feature-daily-function' of https://github.com/BenjoBurger/tp:
  Add comments to explain code
  Add filter function to show only news articles that are related to the mentioned topic
  Add comparator to sort list of topics and showTopics() to show the list of news topics
  Add NewsTopic class to categorise news articles based on topic

* 'master' of https://github.com/BenjoBurger/tp: (26 commits)
  Revised NewsOnTheGo
  Revised NewsOnTheGo
  Revised NewsOnTheGo
  Revised NewsOnTheGo
  revised NewsOnTheGo
  revised InfoNewsCommand
  Revised UI class
  Added UI class & infoNewsCommand class
  Added a UI class & infoNewsCommand class
  Update NewsOnTheGoTest.java
  Adjust declaration order
  Fix variable order
  Add user preference tracking system
  Make setup changes
  Add missing curly brackets
  Remove unused imports
  Add JUnit test case for daily function and move function into a package
  Add Junit test
  Create daily Function
  JUnit test case for 'infoNews'
  ...

commitResults.messageTitle: Update documentation of daily function for developer guide
Add date format to daily function and update code base on code review
Add save feature to daily function
Add exceptions to check for valid date format
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/BenjoBurger/tp into feature/daily-function
commitResults.messageBody:
* 'master' of https://github.com/BenjoBurger/tp:
  Modify TopicsFile to comply with checkstyle test
  Add saved_Topics to keep track of user's favourite topics
  Resolve build errors on github
  Add star function along with peripheral functions to allow uuser to keep track of favourite topics
  Edit code to comply with checkstyle
  Add JavaDoc comments to code
  Shift main code down
  More exception handling for saveNews in NewsOnTheGo class
  More exception handling for commands that require article index - get, save, source, info
  Add exceptions to handle exceptions when an invalid task index is given
  Add get command to show news content
  Edit Parser Command to ensure error message is printed when invalid command is given
  Article Scrapper for selected news articles
  edit handleCommand in Parser class to allow retrieving of articles in each specific topic
  edit filterNews to include article index
  Remove assert in filterNews
  Add Load enum and feature
  Update DeveloperGuide.md
  Add printTopics into UI class which replaces showTopics on NewsOnTheGo
  Resolve NewsOnTheGoTest.java Gradle issues

# Conflicts:
#	data/testArticleScrapper.txt
#	src/test/java/newsonthego/NewsOnTheGoTest.java
